items.summary: Update the existing /jobs route page to be a “Latest Government Jobs” page for Nath Cyber Cafe, with user-facing copy focused on Indian government job vacancies (not general/remote jobs).
Add the generated government-style emblem image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and use it in the Jobs page header area.

Implement a government-jobs data source and replace the current Remotive jobs integration so the Jobs page fetches and displays Indian government job vacancies from trusted sources (RSS feeds or public APIs where available), normalized into a single job list.

Ensure each job card displays the required government-job fields and provides a prominent “Apply Now” button that opens the official notification/application link in a new tab with secure external linking.

Add search and filtering specifically for government jobs: search must filter by job title OR qualification text; category filter options must include exactly: SSC, Railway, Banking, UPSC, State PSC; and the page must support the broader job types requested (Central Government Jobs, State Government Jobs, Railway Jobs, SSC Jobs, Banking Jobs, Defence Jobs, Teaching Jobs) via categories/tags.
Keep “Load More” pagination, add a visible “Last Updated” timestamp for the job data, and provide user-friendly error handling if the feed/API fails.

Enforce “official sources only” for apply links by validating/whitelisting official government organization domains before rendering/enabling “Apply Now”, including references such as UPSC, SSC, Railway Recruitment Board, IBPS, and SBI; block or clearly label any non-official links.

Update the Jobs page UI to a professional, trustworthy, government-style layout using a royal blue + white theme, with a header area that includes a government-style icon/emblem and card-based listings with a bold “Apply Now” button.

Add the requested footer content for this government jobs experience: show Nath Cyber Cafe contact details (including phone 9435212145), a WhatsApp chat button, and the disclaimer text exactly: “This website only provides information and official links. We are not a government organization.”

Add/adjust SEO metadata for the government jobs page to reflect “Latest Government Jobs” and ensure fast-loading behavior (avoid heavy client processing), keeping code clean and well-commented around data mapping, filtering, and pagination.
